entry.title: Remarks On $\aleph_0$-Injectivity
entry.summary: In this article we continue to study $\aleph_0$-injectivity.

entry.title: Type 4 is not computable
entry.summary: We extend a recent result of McKenzie, and show that it is an undecidable problem to determine if 4 appears in the typeset of a finitely generated, locally finite variety.

entry.title: On rational extension of Heisenberg algebra
entry.summary: Construction of rational extension for Heisenberg algebra with one pair of generators is discussed.

entry.title: Affine structures on filiform Lie algebras
entry.summary: In this note we prove that every non characteristically filiform Lie algebra is endowed with an affine structure.

entry.title: On a new approach to classification of associative algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we explore a new method of analysis of associative algebras.

entry.title: Invariants of finite Hopf algebras
entry.summary: This paper extends classical results in the invariant theory of finite groups and finite group schemes to the actions of finite Hopf algebras on commutative rings.

entry.title: A particular matrix and its relationships with Fibonacci numbers
entry.summary: Determinants and symmetric functions of the eigenvalues of matrices characterizing stochastic processes with indepedent increments. Relationships with Fibonacci numbers are derived.

entry.title: On associative conformal algebras of linear growth II
entry.summary: We classify unital associative conformal algebras of linear growth and provide new examples of such.

entry.title: Ext vanishing and infinite Auslander-Buchsbaum
entry.summary: A vanishing theorem is proved for Ext groups over non-commutative graded algebras. Along the way, an "infinite" version is proved of the non-commutative Auslander-Buchsbaum theorem.

entry.title: On algebras that almost have finite dimensional representations
entry.summary: We introduce the notion of almost finite dimensionality of algebras and study its connection with the classical finiteness conditions.

entry.title: A class of group-like object
entry.summary: We introduce a class of group-like objects and prove that Cayley Theorem on groups has a counterpart in the class of group-like objects.

entry.title: Finite flat and projective dimension
entry.summary: Over a right-noetherian algebra admitting a dualizing complex, any left-module with finite flat dimension also has finite projective dimension.

entry.title: The Gorenstein projective modules are precovering
entry.summary: The Gorenstein projective modules are proved to form a precovering class in the module category of a ring which has a dualizing complex.

entry.title: Dixmier's Problem 5 for the Weyl Algebra
entry.summary: A proof is given to the Dixmier's 5'th problem for the Weyl algebra.

entry.title: Analytic clones
entry.summary: We use a method from descriptive set theory to investigate the two precomplete clones above the unary clone on a countable set.

entry.title: A note on recurrence sequences
entry.summary: In this note we provide a simple formula of general term of recurrent sequence.

entry.title: Full graph and complete Lie algebra
entry.summary: We introduce a concept, $d$-complete, and show that a Lie algebra is $d$-complete if and only if its full graph is complete.

entry.title: The Lie algebra of cyclic coinvariants of a symplectic space
entry.summary: We exhibit a natural Lie algebra structure on the graded space of cyclic coinvariants of a symplectic vector space.

entry.title: An infinite dimensional affine nil algebra with finite Gelfand-Kirillov dimension
entry.summary: We construct a nil algebra over a countable field which has finite but non-zero Gelfand-Kirillov dimension.

entry.title: Simple decompositions of simple special Jordan superalgebras
entry.summary: We classify decompositions of simple special finite-dimensional Jordan superalgebras over an algebraically closed field of characteristic zero into the sum of two proper simple subsuperalgebras.

entry.title: Symplectic reflection algebras and non-homogeneous N-Koszul property
entry.summary: From symplectic reflection algebras, some algebras are naturally introduced. We show that these algebras are non-homogeneous N-Koszul algebras, through a PBW theorem.

entry.title: A note on infinitely distributive inverse semigroups
entry.summary: We show that in any infinitely distributive inverse semigroup the existing binary meets distribute over all the joins that exist.

entry.title: Comment on a Paper by Yucai Su On Jacobian Conjecture
entry.summary: The said paper [2] entitled "Proof Of Two Dimensional Jacobian Conjecture" is with gaps.

entry.title: A Lie grading which is not a semigroup grading
entry.summary: This note is devoted to the construction of a graded Lie algebra, whose grading is not given by a semigroup.

entry.title: Lie algebras of small dimension
entry.summary: We present a list of all isomorphism classes of nonsolvable Lie algebras of dimension less than 7 over a finite field.

entry.title: Comment on a Paper by Yucai Su On Jacobian Conjecture (Dec 30, 2005
entry.summary: The said paper [Su2] entitled "Proof Of Two Dimensional Jacobian Conjecture" is false.

entry.title: Deformation theory of dialgebra morphisms
entry.summary: An algebraic deformation theory of dialgebra morphisms is obtained.
entry.arxiv:comment: 15 pages. To appear in Algebra Colloquium

entry.title: Generalizations of Jordan Algebras and Malcev Algebras
entry.summary: We introduce two classes of nonassociative algebras and define the building blocks in the context of the new nonassociative algebras.

entry.title: A Minimalist Construction of the Geometric Algebra
entry.summary: The geometric algebra is constructed from minimal raw materials.

entry.title: Algebre de Clifford d'un antiautomorphisme
entry.summary: We give a definition of the Clifford algebra of an antiautomorphism of a central simple algebra, and compute it for the algebras of degree 2.

entry.title: Projectivity of Hopf algebras over subalgebras with semilocal central localizations
entry.summary: Some new results on the module structure of Hopf algebras over a certain class of Hopf subalgebras and right coideal subalgebras are proved.

entry.title: On quasi-Frobenius bimodules and corings
entry.summary: It is proved here that any quasi-Frobenius bimodule produces a quasi-Frobenius comatrix coring

entry.title: Prime to p extensions of the generic abelian crossed product
entry.summary: We prove that the noncyclic generic abelian crossed product p-algebras constructed by Amitsur and Saltman remain noncyclic after tensoring by any prime to p extension.

entry.title: On (n+2)-dimensional n-Lie algebras
entry.summary: I show that an (n+2)-dimensional n-Lie algebra over an algebraically closed field must have a subalgeba of codimension 1.

entry.title: The Maximal Integral Domain Generated By A Commutative Ring
entry.summary: In this paper, we exhibit the creation of the maximal integral domain mid(R) generated by a nonzero commutative ring R.

entry.title: Additivity of Jordan Elementary Maps on Rings
entry.summary: We prove that Jordan elementary surjective maps on rings are automatically additive.

entry.title: The Jacobian algebras
entry.summary: The Jacobian algebras are introduced and their various properties are studied.

entry.title: Elementary Maps on Triangular Algebras
entry.summary: In this note we prove that elementary maps on triangular algebras are automically additive.

entry.title: On Jordan Derivations of Triangular Algebras
entry.summary: In this short note we prove that every Jordan derivation of triangular algebras is a derivation.

entry.title: New Generalizations of Poisson Algebras
entry.summary: We introduce many new generalizations of Poisson algebras which can be constructed inside the associative algebra of linear transformations over a vector space.

entry.title: Corners of normal matrices
entry.summary: We study various conditions on matrices $B$ and $C$ under which they can be the off-diagonal blocks of a partitioned normal matrix.

entry.title: Algebraic systems of matrices and Grobner basis
entry.summary: One studies a particular algebraic system where the unknowns are matrices. We solve this system according to the parameters values thanks to the theory of Grobner basis.

entry.title: Reduction theorems for Noether's problem
entry.summary: We will give several reduction theorems for Noether's problem.

entry.title: Special types of intuitionistic fuzzy left h-ideals of hemirings
entry.summary: Characteristic, normal and completely normal intuitionistic fuzzy left $h$-ideals of hemirings are described.

entry.title: Mathematical Foundations of Supersymmetry
entry.summary: We lay down the foundations for a systematic study of differentiable and algebraic supervarieties, with a special attention to supergroups.

entry.title: Generalized Cohn's Theorem
entry.summary: We introduce the notion of a free associative $\mathcal{Z}_2$-algebra on the union of two disjoint sets and prove a generalization of Cohn's Theorem on Jordan algebras.

entry.title: Lie algebra F-normalisers are intravariant
entry.summary: Let F be a saturated formation of soluble Lie algebras and let U be an F-normaliser of the soluble Lie algebra L. Then U is intravariant in L.

entry.title: Covering theorems for Artinian rings
entry.summary: The covering properties of Artinian rings which depend on their additive structure only, are investigated.

entry.title: The derivation algebra and automorphism group of the twisted Schrödinger-Virasoro algebra
entry.summary: In this article, we determine the derivation algebra and the automorphism group of the twisted Schr\"{o}dinger-Virasoro algebra.

entry.title: Lie-like Algebras (Superalgeras)
entry.summary: We introduce the notion of a Lie-like algebra$^{\diamond}$ (superalgebra$^{\diamond}$) for $\diamond\in\{^{1-st}, ^{2-nd}, ^{3-rd} \}$.

entry.title: Generalization of One of Lie's Theorems
entry.summary: We prove a generalization of one of Lie's Theorems in the context of Lie-like algebras$^{2-nd}$.

entry.title: On decomposition of commutative Moufang groupoids
entry.summary: We prove that every commutative Moufang groupoid is a semilattice of Archimedean subgroupoids.

entry.title: 0-Cohomology of semigroups
entry.summary: This article is a survey of 0-cohomology of semigroups. The main attention is devoted to applications.

entry.title: Free algebras and the Freiheitssatz
entry.summary: There have been gaps found in the proofs. The paper is withdrawn until further notice.

entry.title: The centralizer of an element in an endomorphism ring
entry.summary: We have results about the centralizer.

entry.title: About the embedding of Moufang loops in alternative algebras
entry.summary: It is proved that any free Moufang loop can be embedded in a loop of invertible elements of some alternative algebra.

entry.title: Eigenvalues of sums of pseudo-Hermitian matrices
entry.summary: We study analogues of classical inequalities for the eigenvalues of sums of pseudo-Hermitian matrices.

entry.title: Gradings on the Kac superalgebra
entry.summary: We classify the gradings on the Kac superalgebra up to equivalence.

entry.title: Gradings on symmetric composition algebras
entry.summary: The group gradings on the symmetric composition algebras over arbitrary fields are classified. Applications of this result to gradings on the exceptional simple Lie algebras are considered too.

entry.title: Hilbert schemes for quantum planes are projective
entry.summary: We show that Hilbert schemes for quantum planes are projective.

entry.title: Jordan gradings on exceptional simple Lie algebras
entry.summary: Models of all the gradings on the exceptional simple Lie algebras induced by Jordan subgroups of their groups of automorphisms are provided.

entry.title: Topological N=2 superconformal superbialgebras
entry.summary: Lie superbialgebra structures on the centerless topological N=2 superconformal algebra $\TT$ are considered, all of which are proved to be coboundary triangular.

entry.title: An elementary approach to Wedderburn's structure theory
entry.summary: Wedderburn's theorem on the structure of finite dimensional semisimple algebras is proved by using minimal prerequisites.

entry.title: Locally extended affine root systems
entry.summary: We consider a natural generalization of both locally finite irreducible root systems and extended affine root systems defined by Saito. We classify the systems.

entry.title: Presentations of matrix rings
entry.summary: We construct a short presentation of the ring of n x n matrices over Z with only 2 generators and 3 relations.

entry.title: Gradings by Groups on Melikyan Algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we describe all gradings by abelian groups without elements of order five on the Melikyan algebras over algebraically closed fields.

entry.title: Primitive ideals of noetherian generalized down-up algebras
entry.summary: We classify the primitive ideals of generalized down-up algebras

entry.title: The Weyl algebra is coherent
entry.summary: In this paper, we show that the Weyl algebra $A_n(k)$ is a coherent ring for any field $k$ and any integer $n \ge 1$.

entry.title: Cramer's rule for some quaternion matrix equations
entry.summary: Cramer's rules for some left, right and two-sided quaternion matrix equations are obtained within the framework of the theory of the column and row determinants.

entry.title: Orthogonal symmetries and Clifford algebras
entry.summary: Involutions of the Clifford algebra of a quadratic space induced by orthogonal symmetries are investigated.

entry.title: Polylinear Mapping of Free Algebra
entry.summary: In this paper I consider the structure of the polylinear mapping of the free algebra over the commutative ring.
entry.arxiv:comment: English text - 19 pages; Russian text - 20 pages

entry.title: On identities in Hom-Malcev algebras
entry.summary: In a Hom-Malcev algebra an identity, equivalent to the Hom-Malcev identity, is found.

entry.title: The translation operator for self-projective coalgebras
entry.summary: We describe the transpose operator for self-projective and symmetric coalgebras in terms of the syzygy and Nakayama functors.

entry.title: A Note on the Jordan Canonical Form
entry.summary: A proof of the Jordan canonical form, suitable for a first course in linear algebra, is given. The proof includes the uniqueness of the number and sizes of the Jordan blocks.

entry.title: Encyclopedia of types of algebras 2010
entry.summary: This is a cornucopia of types of algebras with some of their properties from the operadic point of view.

entry.title: Minimal clones generated by majority operations
entry.summary: We determine all majority operations on a four-element set that generate a minimal clone.

entry.title: Minimal clones with few majority operations
entry.summary: We characterize minimal clones generated by a majority function containing at most seven ternary operations.

entry.title: Minimal clones with many majority operations
entry.summary: We present two minimal clones containing 26 and 78 majority operations respectively, more than any other previously known example.

entry.title: Polymorphism of Representations of Universal Algebra
entry.summary: In this paper I consider the polymorpism of representations of universal algebra and tensor product of representations of universal algebra.
entry.arxiv:comment: English text - 14 pages; Russian text - 14 pages

entry.title: A Generalization of Injective and Projective Complexes
entry.summary: In this paper we give a generalization of injective and projective complexes.

entry.title: Invariant Algebras
entry.summary: We introduce invariant algebras and representation$^{(c_1,..., c_8)}$ of algebras, and give many ways of constructing Lie algebras, Jordan algebras, Leibniz algebras, pre-Lie algebras and left-symmetric algebras in an invariant algebras.

entry.title: LU decomposition of totally nonnegative matrices
entry.summary: A uniqueness theorem for an LU decomposition of a totally nonnegative matrix is obtained.

entry.title: A note on the simple modules over McConnell--Pettit algebras
entry.summary: We consider simple modules over the McConnell--Pettit algebras. We show that both induction and contraction yield simple modules for the extremes of the global dimension.

entry.title: Subnormal subgroups of groups and ideals of group rings
entry.summary: Consideration of certain properties of group rings and their ideals search

entry.title: The Clifford Twist
entry.summary: Gives an elementary exposition of the twisted group algebra rep- resentation of simple Clifford algebras

entry.title: Some problems in operad theory
entry.summary: This is a list of some problems and conjectures related to various types of algebras, that is to algebraic operads. Some comments and hints are included.

entry.title: (n+1)-Ary derivations of simple Malcev algebras
entry.summary: We defined (n+1)-ary derivations of n-ary algebras. We described 3-derivations of simple Malcev algebras and 4-ary derivations of simple ternary Malcev algebra M_8.

entry.title: Faithful representations of Leibniz algebras
entry.summary: Let L be a Leibniz algebra of dimension n. I prove the existence of a faithful L-module of dimension less than or equal to n+1.

entry.title: Cominuscule parabolics of simple finite dimensional Lie superalgebras
entry.summary: We give an explicit classification of the cominuscule parabolic subalgebras of all complex simple finite dimensional Lie superalgebras.

entry.title: Noetherian Hopf algebras
entry.summary: A brief survey of some aspects of noetherian Hopf algebras is given, concentrating on structure, homology, and classification, and accompanied by a panoply of open problems.

entry.title: Generalization of Pigeon Hole Bound
entry.summary: H.-F. Lu, J. Lahtonen, R. Vehkalahti, and C. Hollanti introduced so called Pigeon Hole Bound for decay function of MIMO-MAC codes. Here we give a generalization for it.

entry.title: On wild Lie algebras
entry.summary: We give a criterion of tameness and wildness for a finite-dimensional Lie algebra over an algebraically closed field.

entry.title: Sheaf Structures On a Class of Noncommutative Spectra
entry.summary: We introduce a class of noncommutative spectra and give the sheaf structure on the class of noncommutative spectra.
entry.arxiv:comment: arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap with arXiv:1104.3956

entry.title: On the exponent of spinor groups
entry.summary: In this paper, we show that all the exponents of degree greater than 2 of spinor groups divide the Dynkin index 2.

entry.title: Leavitt Path Algebras of Finite Gelfand-Kirillov Dimension
entry.summary: Groebner-Shirshov basis and Gelfand-Kirillov dimension of the Leavitt path algebra are derived.

entry.title: Centralizers in partially commutative Lie algebras (in Russian)
entry.summary: In this paper, the complete description of centralizers of elements in partially commutative Lie algebras is obtained. The description is given explicitly in the terms of generators.

entry.title: About Cartan-Subalgebras in Lie-Algebras associated to Associative Algebras
entry.summary: We study Cartan-Subalgebras of Lie-Algebras associated to associative algebras.

entry.title: Fine gradings on $\mathfrak{e}_6$
entry.summary: There are fourteen fine gradings on the exceptional Lie algebra $\frak e_6$ over an algebraically closed field of zero characteristic. We provide their descriptions and a proof that they are all.

entry.title: Classification of factorial generalized down-up algebras
entry.summary: We determine when a generalized down-up algebra is a Noetherian unique factorisation domain or a Noetherian unique factorisation ring.

entry.title: Hom-Lie-Yamaguti structures on Hom-Leibniz algebras
entry.summary: Multiplicative left Hom-Leibniz algebras have natural Hom-Lie-Yamaguti structure.

entry.title: Derivations in some Finite Endomorphism Semirings
entry.summary: The goal of this paper is to provide some basic structure information on derivations in finite semirings.

entry.title: Duality for groupoid (co)actions
entry.summary: In this paper we present Cohen-Montgomery-type duality theorems for groupoid (co)actions.

entry.title: Local Cohomology and non commutative Gorenstein algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we continue the study of non connected graded Gorenstein algebras initiated in a previous paper, the main result is the proof of a version of the Local Cohomology formula.

entry.title: δ-derivations of semisimple structurable algebras
entry.summary: We described all \delta-derivations of semisimple f.-d. structurable algebras over algebraically closed field with characteritic is not equal 2,3,5.

entry.title: A finite dimensional algebra of the diagram of a knot
entry.summary: To a regular projection of a knot we associate a finite dimensional non-commutative associative algebra which is self-injective and special biserial.

entry.title: Hall polynomials for representation-finite cluster-tilted algebras
entry.summary: We show the existence of Hall polynomials for representation-finite cluster-tilted algebras.

entry.title: Pseudo-multiplications and their properties
entry.summary: We examine some properties of pseudo-multiplications, which are a special kind of associative binary relations defined on $\bar{\mathbb{R}}_+ \times \bar{\mathbb{R}}_+$.

entry.title: Dedekind's Transposition Principle for lattices of equivalence relations
entry.summary: We prove a version of Dedekind's Transposition Principle that holds in lattices of equivalence relations.

entry.title: Connected Hopf algebras of Gelfand-Kirillov dimension four
entry.summary: We classify connected Hopf algebras of Gelfand-Kirillov dimension 4 over an algebraic closed field of characteristic zero.

entry.title: Geometric Classification of 4-Dimensional Superalgebras
entry.summary: We give a geometric classification of 4-dimensional superalgebras over an algebraic closed field.
entry.arxiv:comment: 3 figures, to appear in Springer Proceedings, AGMP 2011 Mulhouse

entry.title: The Ring of Algebraic Functions on Persistence Bar Codes
entry.summary: We study the ring of algebraic functions on the space of persistence barcodes, with applications to pattern recognition.

entry.title: The groups of automorphisms of the Witt $W_n$ and Virasoro Lie algebras
entry.summary: The groups of automorphisms of the Witt $W_n$ and Virasoro Lie algebras are found.

entry.title: Some forms of exceptional Lie algebras
entry.summary: Some forms of Lie algebras of types E_6, E_7, and E_8 are constructed using the exterior cube of a rank 9 finitely generated projective module.

entry.title: Weyl groups of the fine gradings on $\e_6$
entry.summary: The Weyl groups of the fine gradings with infinite universal grading group on $\mathfrak{e}_6$ are given.

entry.title: On the theorem of Amitsur--Levitzki
entry.summary: We present a proof of the Amitsur--Levitzki theorem which is a basis for a general theory of equivariant skew--symmetric maps on matrices.

entry.title: Extended Armendariz Rings
entry.summary: In this note we introduce central linear Armendariz rings as a generalization of Armendariz rings and investigate their properties.

entry.title: Euclid and Frobenius structures on Weyl algebra
entry.summary: A non-degenerate associative bilinear form and a positive definite symmetric bilinear form on Weyl algebra are constructed.

entry.title: 2p-Commutator on differential operators of order p
entry.summary: We show that a space of one variable differential operators of order $p$ admits non-trivial $2p$-commutator and the number $2p$ here can not be improved.

entry.title: About some properties of algebras obtained by the Cayley-Dickson process
entry.summary: This paper is a short survey about some properties of algebras ob- tained by the Cayley-Dickson process and some of their applications.

entry.title: Fine gradings on the simple Lie algebras of type $E$
entry.summary: Some fine gradings on the exceptional Lie algebras $\mathfrak{e}_6$, $\mathfrak{e}_7$ and $\mathfrak{e}_8$ are described. This list tries to be exhaustive.

entry.title: What happened to PI theory?
entry.summary: This paper is a request for help to clarify a rather confusing state of the Theory.

entry.title: Finite Extensions of $\mathbb{Z}_\mathrm{max}$
entry.summary: We classify the semifields and division semirings containing the max-plus semifield $\mathbb{Z}_\mathrm{max}$, which are finitely generated as $\mathbb{Z}_\mathrm{max}$-semimodules.

entry.title: Some Results about Triangular Representations of Lie Algebras
entry.summary: We introduce the concept of a triangular representation of a Lie algebra, give a counterpart of Ado's theorem, and discuss $2$-irreducible triangular modules over a nonreductive Lie algebra.

entry.title: Distributive Quotients
entry.summary: We note that each lattice $L$ has a unique largest distributive quotient, of which every distributive quotient of $L$ is itself a quotient.

entry.title: Counterexample to conjugacy of maximal abelian diagonalizable subalgebras in Extended Affine Lie algebras
entry.summary: We give a counterexample to the conjugacy of maximal abelian diagonalizable subalgebras in extended affine Lie algebras.

entry.title: The Wedderburn b-decomposition for alternative baric algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we deal with the Wedderburn b-decomposition for alternative baric algebras.

entry.title: Conservative algebras of 2-dimensional algebras
entry.summary: We describe derivations and subalgebras of codimensions 1 of conservative algebras of small dimensions.

entry.title: Minimal number of restrictions defining a periodic word
entry.summary: Sketch of the proof of estimation of number of restictions required for defining a periodic word in the finite alphabet. Uses the Rausy graphs.

entry.title: 1-Primitive Near-rings
entry.summary: We give a classification of $1$-primitive near-rings using sandwich centralizer near-rings

entry.title: Coherence of relatively quasi-free algebras
entry.summary: We prove coherence of relatively quasi-free algebras over noetherian rings. Chase criterion for coherence is used.

entry.title: The geometry of polynomial identities
entry.summary: We discuss some geometric invariants of polynomial identities of algebras deduced from Kemer's theory and deduce some quantitative information on codimension and co--length

entry.title: Kemer's Theorem for Affine PI Algebras Over a Field of Characteristic Zero
entry.summary: We present a proof of Kemer's representability theorem for affine PI algebras over a field of characteristic zero.

entry.title: On Automorphisms of Biproducts
entry.summary: We study certain subgroups of the full group of Hopf algebra automorphisms of a biproduct. In the process interesting subgroups of certain permutation groups come into play.

entry.title: On Scalable Monoids
entry.summary: This brief exposition presents some basic properties of scalable monoids and quantity spaces, introduced in arXiv:1408.5024

entry.title: Nil-clean companion matrices
entry.summary: We describe nil-clean companion matrices over fields.

entry.title: Finitely presented quadratic algebras of intermediate growth
entry.summary: In this article, we give two examples of finitely presented quadratic algebras (algebras presented by quadratic relations) of intermediate growth.

entry.title: On finitely presented algebras
entry.summary: We prove that if $A$ is finitely presented algebra with idempotent $e$ such that $A=AeA=A(1-e)A$ then the algebra $eAe$ is finitely presented.

entry.title: Centers of Cuntz-Krieger $C^*$-algebras
entry.summary: For a finite directed graph $\Gamma$ we determine the center of the Cuntz-Krieger $C^*$-algebra $CK(\Gamma).$

entry.title: Nakayama automorphism of a class of graded algebras
entry.summary: The Nakayama automorphism of a class of connected graded Artin-Schelter regular algebras is calculated explicitly.

entry.title: Affine Algebras with Arbitrary Simple Modules
entry.summary: We construct affine algebras with an arbitrary amount of simple modules of each dimension.

entry.title: A Grätzer-Schmidt theorem for the Lindenbaum-Tarski algebra of IPC
entry.summary: We prove a version of the Gr\"atzer-Schmidt theorem for the Lindenbaum-Tarski algebra associated to the Implicational Propositional Calculus.

entry.title: Non-isometric involutive anti-automorphisms
entry.summary: We exhibit a non-constructive proof in which anti-automorphisms are not valuation-preserving and hence non-isometric

entry.title: Nakayama Automorphism and Rigidity of Dual Reflections Group Coactions
entry.summary: We study homological properties and rigidity of group coactions on Artin-Schelter regular algebras.

entry.title: Associative and Jordan algebras generated by two idempotents
entry.summary: Associative or Jordan algebras generated by two idempotents are described precisely.

entry.title: Finite homogeneous effect algebras with trivial sharp elements
entry.summary: In this paper we describe finite homogeneous effect algebras whose sharp elements are only $0$ and $1$.

entry.title: Computational experiments with nilpotent Lie algebra
entry.summary: In this note we present some experimental results on the general matrix nilpotent Lie algebras derived by calculations on a computer

entry.title: The Birman-Murakami-Wenzl Algebra of Coxeter Type D
entry.summary: The paper defines a generic Birman-Wenzl algebra of Coxeter Type D and investigates its structure as a semi-simple algebra.

entry.title: New problems in universal algebraic geometry illustrated by boolean equations
entry.summary: We discuss new problems in universal algebraic geometry and explain them by boolean equations.

entry.title: Subdirect sums of Lie algebras
entry.summary: We show Lie algebra versions of some results on homological finiteness properties of subdirect products of groups, including a version of the 1-2-3 Theorem.

entry.title: Finite presentation is a Morita invariant property
entry.summary: We prove that the property of an algebra to be finitely presented is Morita invariant.

entry.title: Lie's correspondence for commutative automorphic formal loops
entry.summary: We develop Lie's correspondence and an explicit Baker-Campbell-Hausdorff formula for commutative automorphic formal loops.

entry.title: Continuity of Seminorms on Finite-Dimensional Vector Spaces
entry.summary: The main purpose of this note is to establish the continuity of seminorms on finite-dimensional vector spaces over the real or complex numbers.

entry.title: Integral group rings with all central units trivial: solvable groups
entry.summary: The object of this paper is to examine finite solvable groups whose integral group rings have only trivial central units.

entry.title: Almost projective and almost injective modules
entry.summary: We describe rings over which every right module is almost injective. We give a description of rings over which every simple module is a almost projective.

entry.title: When the group ring of a finite group over a field is serial
entry.summary: We make a list of finite simple groups whose group rings over a given field are serial.

entry.title: About approximate and dual Lie algebras
entry.summary: The Lie algebras over the algebra of dual numbers are introduced and investigated.

entry.title: Stabilizer group of generalized determinant
entry.summary: In this paper, we consider linear combination of determinant and permanent, which we call generalized determinant, and determine the stabilizer group of it.

entry.title: Noncommutative frames
entry.summary: We explore algebraic properties of noncommutative frames. The concept of noncommutative frames is due to Le Bruyn, who introduced it in connection with noncommutative covers of the Connes-Consani arithmetic site.

entry.title: Complete Classification of Two-Dimensional Algebras
entry.summary: A complete classification of two-dimensional algebras over algebraically closed fields is provided

entry.title: Direct products, varieties, and compactness conditions
entry.summary: We study equationally Noetherian varieties of groups, rings and monoids. Moreover, we describe equationally Noetherian direct powers for these algebraic structures.

entry.title: Relation identities equivalent to congruence modularity
entry.summary: We present some identities dealing with reflexive and admissible relations and which, through a variety, are equivalent to congruence modularity.

entry.title: Hermitian and skew hermitian forms over local rings
entry.summary: We study the classification problem of possibly degenerate hermitian and skew hermitian bilinear forms over local rings where 2 is a unit.

entry.title: Universality of Univariate Mixed Fractions in Divisive Meadows
entry.summary: Univariate fractions can be transformed to mixed fractions in the equational theory of meadows of characteristic zero.

entry.title: The automorphism groups and derivation algebras of two-dimensional algebras
entry.summary: The automorphisms groups and derivation algebras of all two-dimensional algebras over algebraically closed fields are described.

entry.title: A Koszul sign map
entry.summary: We define a Koszul sign map encoding the Koszul sign convention. A cohomological interpretation is given.

entry.title: The Weyl group of a very special sandwich algebra of class $\mathcal{C}$
entry.summary: This paper constructs a Weyl group $W_{\widetilde{\mathfrak{g}}}$ of a very special sandwich algebra $\widetilde{\mathfrak{g}}$ of class $\mathcal{C}$.

entry.title: Another surper-identity equivalent to the Hom-Malcev super-identity
entry.summary: In a Hom-superalgebra, a super-identity equivalent to the Hom-Malcev super-identity is found.

entry.title: Jordan derivations in finite endomorphism semirings
entry.summary: The aim of this article is to start a study of Jordan derivations in finite endomorphism semirings.

entry.title: Classification of two-dimensional Jordan algebras
entry.summary: A classification, up to isomorphism, of two-dimensional (not necessarily commutative) Jordan algebras over any algebraically closed field is presented in terms of their matrices of structure constants.

entry.title: Magic Squares of Lie Algebras
entry.summary: An improved (streamlined and extended) version of this paper is available as math.RA/0203010, which however omits some details. We recommend the later version unless details are essential.
entry.arxiv:comment: Theorems 1 and 3 corrected (theta replaced by its inverse)

entry.title: Existence of Bernstein-Sato polynomials by using the analytic Grobner fan
entry.summary: In 1987, C. Sabbah proved the existence of Bernstein-Sato polynomials associated with several analytic functions. The purpose of this article is to give a more elementary and constructive proof of the result of C. Sabbah based on the notion of the analytic Gr\"obner fan of a D-module.
entry.arxiv:comment: 17 pages, 4 figures. This is a translation into english of the accepted version of math.RA/0307179 which is to appear in Compositio Math

entry.title: Mutations for quivers with potentials: Oberwolfach talk, April 2007
entry.summary: This is an extended abstract of my talk at the Oberwolfach Workshop "Algebraic Groups" (April 22 - 28, 2007). It is based on a joint work with H.Derksen and J.Weyman (arXiv:0704.0649v2 [math.RA]).
entry.arxiv:comment: Part of Oberwolfach Report No. 22/2007 (Workshop on Algebraic Groups, April 22 - 28, 2007)

entry.title: Mathematical Structures Defined by Identities II
entry.summary: In our paper arXiv: math.RA/0110333 v1 Oct 2001 we showed that the number of algebras defined by a binary operation satisfying a formally irreducible identity between two n-iterates is O( e^{-n/16}S_{n}^{2} for n --> infinity, S_{n} being the nth-Catalan number. This was proved by using exclusively the series of tableaux A_{n}. By using also the series of tableaux B_{n}, we now sharpen this result to O{(n+2)/n|e^{-n/16}-2/n)|S_{n}^{2}}

entry.title: Depth Two and the Galois Coring
entry.summary: We study the cyclic module ${}_SR$ for a ring extension $A \| B$ with centralizer $R$ and bimodule endomorphism ring $S = End {}_BA_B$. We show that if $A \| B$ is an H-separable Hopf subalgebra, then $B$ is a normal Hopf subalgebra of $A$. We observe from math.RA/0107064 and math.RA/0108067 depth two in the role of noncommutative normality (as in field theory) in a depth two separable Frobenius characterization of irreducible semisimple-Hopf-Galois extensions. We prove that a depth two extension has a Galois $A$-coring structure on $A \o_R T$ where $T$ is the right $R$-bialgebroid dual to $S$.

entry.title: Existence of Gorenstein projective resolutions
entry.summary: Gorenstein rings are important to mathematical areas as diverse as algebraic geometry, where they encode information about singularities of spaces, and homotopy theory, through the concept of model categories. In consequence, the study of Gorenstein rings has led to the advent of a whole branch of homological algebra, known as Gorenstein homological algebra. This paper solves one of the open problems of Gorenstein homological algebra by showing that so-called Gorenstein projective resolutions exist over quite general rings, thereby enabling the definition of a Gorenstein version of derived functors. An application is given to the theory of Tate cohomology.

entry.title: A number of countable models of a countable supersimple theory
entry.summary: In this paper, we prove the number of countable models of a countable supersimple theory is either 1 or infinite. This result is an extension of Lachlan's theorem on a superstable theory.

entry.title: Almost orthogonal submatrices of an orthogonal matrix
entry.summary: Let $A$ be an $n \times M$ matrix whose rows are orthonormal. Let $A_I$ be a submatrix of $A$ whose column indexes belong to the set $I$. Given $\epsilon >0$ we estimate the smallest cardinality of the set $I$, such that the operator $A_I$ is an $\epsilon$-isometry.

entry.title: A note on Lascar strong types in simple theories
entry.summary: Let T be a countable, small simple theory. In this paper, we prove for such T, the notion of Lascar Strong type coincides with the notion of a strong type,over an arbitrary set.

entry.title: Modularity prevents tails
entry.summary: We establish a direct correspondence between two congruence poroperties for finite algebras. The first property is that minimal sets of type i omit tails. The second property is that congruence lattices omit pentagons of type i.

entry.title: Closures in $\aleph_0$-categorical bilinear maps
entry.summary: Alternating bilinear maps with few relations allow to define a combinatorial closure similarly as in [2]. For the $\aleph_0$-categorical case we show that this closure is part of the algebraic closure.

author.name: Andreas Baudisch
author.arxiv:affiliation: Humbolt-Universität zu Berlin, Institut für Mathematik

entry.title: Quasi-o-minimal groups
entry.summary: The authors investigate the structure of quasi-o-minimal groups. Among other results, they show that quasi-o-minimal groups are abelian, that quasi-o-minimal densely ordered archimedian groups are divisible, and that every divisible quasi-o-minimal group is o-miminal.

entry.title: The Pfaffian closure on an o-minimal structure
entry.summary: Every o-minimal expansion R-tilde of the real field has an o-minimal expansion P(R-tilde) in which the solutions to Pfaffian equations with definable C^1 coefficients are definable.

entry.title: On the $n$-ary algebras, semigroups and their universal covers
entry.summary: For any $n$-ary associative algebra we construct a $\Z_{n-1}$ graded algebra, which is a universal object containing the $n$-ary algebra as a subspace of elements of degree 1. Similar construction is carried out for semigroups.

entry.title: Supersimple fields and division rings
entry.summary: It is proved that any supersimple field has trivial Brauer group, and more generally that any supersimple division ring is commutative. As prerequisites we prove several results about generic types in groups and fields whose theory is simple.

entry.title: Lascar and Morley ranks differ in differentially closed fields
entry.summary: We note here, in answer to a question of Poizat, that the Morley and Lascar ranks need not coincide in differentially closed fields. We approach this through the (perhaps) more fundamental issue of the variation of Morley rank in families.

entry.title: The graded version of Goldie's Theorem
entry.summary: The analogue of Goldie's Theorem for prime rings is proved for rings graded by abelian groups, eliminating unnecessary additional hypotheses used in earlier versions.

entry.title: Graded Lie Algebras of Maximal Class II
entry.summary: We describe the isomorphism classes of infinite-dimensional graded Lie algebras of maximal class, generated by elements of weight one, over fields of odd characteristic.

entry.title: Artin Algebras with Loops but no Outer Derivations
entry.summary: We construct Artin algebras with vanishing first Hochschild Cohomology but a loop in their ordinary quiver. Some authors guessed earlier that such examples could not exist.

entry.title: Bimodule complexes via strong homotopy actions
entry.summary: We present a new and explicit method for lifting a tilting complex to a bimodule complex. The key ingredient of our method is the notion of a strong homotopy action in the sense of Stasheff.

entry.title: Total positivity: tests and parametrizations
entry.summary: An introduction to total positivity (TP), with the emphasis on efficient TP criteria and parametrizations of TP matrices. Intended for general mathematical audience.

entry.title: On the degrees of irreducible representations of Hopf algebras
entry.summary: Let H denote a semisimple Hopf algebra over an algebraically closed field k of characteristic 0. We show that the degree of any irreducible representation of H whose character belongs to the center of H^* must divide the dimension of H .

entry.title: Matrix Theory over the Complex Quaternion Algebra
entry.summary: We present in this paper some fundamental tools for developing matrix analysis over the complex quaternion algebra. As applications, we consider generalized inverses, eigenvalues and eigenvectors, similarity, determinants of complex quaternion matrices, and so on.

entry.title: Lattices, interpolation, and set theory
entry.summary: We review a few results concerning interpolation of monotone functions on infinite lattices, emphasizing the role of set-theoretic considerations. We also discuss a few open problems.

entry.title: A Note on Cyclic Gradients
entry.summary: Simple necessary and sufficient conditions for a $n$-tuple of noncommutative polynomials to be a cyclic gradient are given and similarly for a noncommutative polynomial to have a vanishing cyclic gradient. Connections with free probability are explained.

entry.title: Algebras without noetherian filtrations
entry.summary: We provide examples of finitely generated noetherian PI algebras for which there is no finite dimensional filtration with a noetherian associated graded ring; thus we answer negatively a question raised by M. Lorenz.

entry.title: Some Properties of 3x3 Octonionic Hermitian Matrices with Non-Real Eigenvalues
entry.summary: We discuss our preliminary attempts to extend previous work on 2x2 Hermitian octonionic matrices with non-real eigenvalues to the 3x3 case.
entry.arxiv:comment: Plain TeX; 12 pages; 1 PS figure included with epsf

entry.title: Characteristically nilpotent Lie algebras : a survey
entry.summary: We review the known results about characteristically nilpotent complex Lie algebras, as well as we comment recent developements in the theory.

entry.title: Separable functors in corings
entry.summary: We give characterizations of the separability of the induction and ad-induction functors associated to a coring morphism.

entry.title: Non-Existence of Complex Structures on Filiform Lie Algebras
entry.summary: The aim of this work is to prove the nonexistence of complex structures over nilpotent Lie algebras of maximal class (also called filiform).

entry.title: Modulization and the enveloping ringoid
entry.summary: Let A be an algebra in a variety V. We study the modulization of a pointed A-overalgebra P, show that it is totally in any variety that P is totally in, and apply this theory to the construction of the enveloping ringoid Z[A,V].

entry.title: A note on the classification of naturally graded Lie algebras with linear characteristic sequence
entry.summary: For sufficiently high dimensions, the naturally graded nonsplit nilpotent Lie algebras with linear characteristic sequence are classified.

entry.title: Simple completable contractions of nilpotent Lie algebras
entry.summary: We study a certain class of non-maximal rank contractions of the nilpotent Lie algebra $\frak{g}_{m}$ and show that these contractions are completable Lie algebras. As a consequence a family of solvable complete Lie algebras of non-maximal rank is given in arbitrary dimension.

entry.title: Open problems on GKK tau-matrices
entry.summary: We propose several open problems on GKK tau-matrices raised by examples showing that some such matrices are unstable
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear in Linear Algebra and its Applications (LAA)

entry.title: Classification of quantum tori with involution
entry.summary: Quantum tori with graded involution appear as coordinate algebras of extended affine Lie algebras of type A_1, C and BC. We classify them in the category of algebras with involution. From this, we obtain precise information on the root systems of extended affine Lie algebras of type C.

entry.title: Identities and derivations for Jacobian algebras
entry.summary: Constructions of n-Lie algebras by strong n-Lie-Poisson algebras are given. First cohomology groups of adjoint module of Jacobian algebras are calculated. Minimal identities of 3-Jacobian algebra are found.

entry.title: Weyl algebra modules
entry.summary: We investigate weight modules for finite and infinite Weyl algebras, classifying all such simple modules. We also study the representation type of the blocks of locally-finite weight module categories and describe indecomposable modules in tame blocks.

entry.title: Lie Superalgebras Graded by the Root System $A(m,n)$
entry.summary: We determine the Lie superalgebras that are graded by the root systems of the basic classical simple Lie superalgebras of type A$(m,n)$.

entry.title: The amenability of affine algebras
entry.summary: We introduce the notion of amenability for affine algebras. We characterize amenability by Folner-sequences, paradoxicality and the existence of finitely invariant dimension-measures. Then we extend the results of Rowen on ranks, from affine algebras of subexponential growth to amenable affine algebras.

entry.title: Multi-dimensional vector product
entry.summary: It is shown that multi-dimensional generalization of the vector product is only possible in seven dimensional space.
entry.arxiv:comment: 6 pages, LaTeX, To be published in Journal of Physics A

entry.title: Poincare duality quivers
entry.summary: The purpose of this paper was to give an algebraic analog of Poincare duality. But there is a mistake in the proof of the main theorem. It will be corrected as soon as possible.

entry.title: Coseparable Corings
entry.summary: We investigate the relationship between coseparable and semisimple corings. In particular we prove that a coring over a separable algebra is coseparable if and only if it is absolutely semisimple.

entry.title: Generating large non-singular matrices over an arbitrary field with blocks of full rank
entry.summary: This note describes a technique for generating large non-singular matrices with blocks of full rank. Our motivation to construct such matrices arises in the white-box implementation of cryptographic algorithms with S-boxes.

entry.title: Classification of some simple graded pre-Lie algebras of growth one
entry.summary: We classify a class of infinite-dimensional simple graded pre-Lie algebras on the graded vector space underlying the algebra of Laurent polynomials, with a specific form for the product.

entry.title: Derivations of Orthosymplectic Lie Superalgebras
entry.summary: In this paper we describe the derivations of orthosymplectic Lie superalgebras over a superring. In particular, we derive sufficient conditions under which the derivations can be expressed as a semidirect product of inner and outer derivations. We then present some examples for which these conditions hold.
entry.arxiv:comment: 27 pages, to be published in Communications in Algebra

entry.title: On the cohomology of a smash product of Hopf algebras
entry.summary: A five term sequence for the low degree cohomology of a smash product of (cocommutative) Hopf algebras is obtained, generalizing that of Tahara for a semi-direct product of groups.

entry.title: Operades Lie-admissibles
entry.summary: The aim of this paper is to present remarkable classes of Lie-admissible algebras containing in particular the associative algebras, the Vinberg algebras and pre-Lie algebras. We determine the associated quadratic operads and their dual operads.

entry.title: A note on Hermitian forms and Maschke's Theorem
entry.summary: The aim of this note is to show that the "usual" proof of the Maschke Theorem in the case of a real and complex field can not be generalized at least to the case of a field of rational functions on a non-singular curve.

entry.title: Noncommutative projective geometry
entry.summary: This article describes recent applications of algebraic geometry to noncommutative algebra. These techniques have been particularly successful in describing graded algebras of small dimension.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Proceedings of the ICM, Beijing 2002, vol. 2, 93--104

entry.title: Sofic groups and direct finiteness
entry.summary: We construct an analogue of Neumann's affiliated algebras for sofic group algebras over arbitrary fields. Consequently, we settle Kaplansky's direct finiteness conjecture for sofic groups.
entry.arxiv:comment: 9 pages, a shortened proof of the main result

entry.title: Non-commutative covers and the modular group
entry.summary: We use non-commutative geometry to study the bulk of finite dimensional representations of the modular group SL(2,Z). We give specific 2n-parameter families of 6n-dimensional representations obtained from the quotient singularity C^2/Z_6.

entry.title: Linear free resolutions over non-commutative algebras
entry.summary: This paper shows among other things that over a non-commutative Koszul algebra, high truncations of finitely generated graded modules have linear free resolutions.
entry.arxiv:comment: 8 pages. To appear in Compositio Math

entry.title: A class of nonassociative algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we consider all these nonassociative algebras defined by the action of invariant subspaces of the symmetric group $\Sigma_3$ on the associator of the considered laws.

entry.title: Lengths of Finite Dimensional Representations of PBW Algebras
entry.summary: We present a proof of an upper bound for the lengths of finite dimensional representations of algebras obeying a modified PBW property, including Lie algebras and quantum groups. The sharpness of the bound is proved and discussed.

entry.title: Comments on the Matrix Representations of Quaternions
entry.summary: Some comments are made on the matrices which serve as the basis of a quaternionic algebra. We show that these matrices are related with the quaternionic action of the imaginary units from the left and from the right.

entry.title: Quaternionic commutations
entry.summary: Given n quaternions we investigate the extent of non-commutativity of their multiple products, commutators and exponential products.

entry.title: Annelidan rings
entry.summary: This paper was withdrawn by the author, Greg Marks. It has been superseded by joint work (in preparation) with Ryszard Mazurek.

entry.title: Simplicity of noncommutative Dedekind domains
entry.summary: The following dichotomy is established: A finitely generated, complex Dedekind domain that is not commutative is simple. Weaker versions of this dichotomy are proved for Dedekind prime rings and hereditary noetherian prime rings.

entry.title: Galois corings from the descent theory point of view
entry.summary: We introduce Galois corings, and give a survey of properties that have been obtained so far. The Definition is motivated using descent theory, and we show that classical Galois theory, Hopf-Galois theory and coalgebra Galois theory can be obtained as a special case.

entry.title: The homotopy category of complexes of projective modules
entry.summary: The homotopy category of complexes of projective left-modules over any reasonably nice ring is proved to be a compactly generated triangulated category, and a duality is given between its subcategory of compact objects and the finite derived category of right-modules.

entry.title: Abelian exact subcategories closed under predecessors
entry.summary: In the category of finitely generated modules over an artinian ring, we classify all the abelian exact subcategories closed under predecessors or, equivalently, all the split torsion pairs with torsion-free class closed under quotients.

entry.title: Dixmier's Problem 6 for the Weyl Algebra (the Generic type Problem)
entry.summary: A short proof is given to Dixmier's 6'th problem for the Weyl algebra (and other algebras of Gelfand-Kirillov dimension which is less than 3 like rings of differential operators on smooth irreducible algebraic curves).

entry.title: Numerically Calabi-Yau orders on surfaces
entry.summary: This is part of an ongoing program to classify maximal orders on surfaces via their ramification data. Del Pezzo and ruled orders have already been classified. In this paper, we classify numerically Calabi-Yau orders which are the noncommutative analogues of surfaces of Kodaira dimension zero.

entry.title: Classification of solvable Lie algebras
entry.summary: We illustrate some simple ideas that can be used for obtaining a classification of small-dimensional solvable Lie algebras.Using these we obtain the classification of 3 and 4 dimensional solvable Lie algebras (over fields of any characteristic). Precise conditions for isomorphism are given.

entry.title: Algebra generators and information theory
entry.summary: A general simplicity problem in category theory is proposed. A particular example, the simplest choice of generators of an algebra is specified and illustrated by an example.

entry.title: Very many term clones in a very small variety
entry.summary: We give an example of a finitely based locally finite variety which has uncountably many term clones. (Such varieties were known before.)
entry.arxiv:comment: 2 pages, LaTeX2e. (Revision now points out known examples)

entry.title: Algebras of non-Archimedean measures on groups
entry.summary: The article is devoted to the investigation of properties of quasi-invariant measures with values in non-Archimedean fields such as: convolutions of measures and functions; continuity of functions of measures; non-associative noncommutative algebras generated with the help of quasi-invariant measures.

entry.title: Galois corings applied to partial Galois theory
entry.summary: Partial Galois extensions were recently introduced by Dokuchaev, Ferrero and Paques. We introduce partial Galois extensions for noncommutative rings, using the theory of Galois corings. We associate a Morita context to a partial action on a ring.

entry.title: Simple associative conformal algebras of linear growth
entry.summary: We describe simple finitely generated associative conformal algebras of Gel'fand--Kirillov dimension one.
entry.arxiv:comment: final version, 18 pages, to appear in J. Algebra

entry.title: The lambda-dimension of commutative arithmetic rings
entry.summary: It is shown that every commutative arithmetic ring $R$ has $lambda$-dimension $ leq 3$. An example of a commutative Kaplansky ring with $ lambda$-dimension 3 is given. If $R$ satisfies an additional condition then $ lambda$-dim($R$)

entry.title: Commutative Local Rings of bounded module type
entry.summary: It is shown that a local ring R of bounded module type is an almost maximal valuation ring if there exists a non-maximal prime ideal J such that R/J is a maximal valuation domain.

entry.title: Local rings of bounded module type are almost maximal valuation rings
entry.summary: It is shown that every commutative local ring of bounded module type is an almost maximal valuation ring.

entry.title: Ore Extensions over Duo Rings
entry.summary: We show that there exist noncommutative Ore extensions in which every right ideal is two-sided. This answers a problem posed by Marks in Duo Rings and Ore extensions, J.Algebra 280(2), (2004). We also provide an easy construction of one sided duo rings.

entry.title: On primitive ideals in polynomial rings over nil rings
entry.summary: Let R be a nil ring. We prove that primitive ideals in the polynomial ring R[x] in one indeterminate over R are of the form I[x] for some ideals I of R.
entry.arxiv:comment: Accepted for publication in "Algebras and Representation Theory"

entry.title: Eigenvalues of Hermitian matrices with positive sum of bounded rank
entry.summary: We give a minimal list of inequalities characterizing the possible eigenvalues of a set of Hermitian matrices with positive semidefinite sum of bounded rank. This answers a question of A. Barvinok.

entry.title: Monoidal Categories of Corings
entry.summary: We introduce a monoidal category of corings using two different notions of corings morphisms. The first one is the (right) coring extensions recently introduced by T. Brzezi\'nski in [2], and the anther is the usual notion of morphisms defined in [5] by J. G\'omez-Torrecillas.

entry.title: Comatrix Corings an Invertible Bimodules
entry.summary: We extend Masuoka's Theorem [11] concerning the isomorphism between the group of invertible bimodules in a non-commutative ring extension and the group of automorphisms of the associated Sweedler's canonical coring, to the class of finite comatrix corings introduced in [6].

entry.title: A class of nonassociative algebras and cogebras
entry.summary: We present classes of nonassociative algebras whose associator satisfies invariance conditions given by the action of the 3 order symmetric group. Amongst these algebras we find the wellknown Pre Lie or Vinberg algebras and the Lie admissible algebras. We study the corresponding noncoassociative cogebras.

entry.title: Automorphisms of categories of free modules and free Lie algebras
entry.summary: We prove that the group of automorphisms of the category of free modules over Noterian rings is semi-inner and present also a short proof of a similar result for the variery of Lie algebras.

entry.title: The group of automorphisms of the category of free associative algebras
entry.summary: In this paper, the problem formulated in [8] is solved. We prove, that the group of automorphisms of the category of free associative algebras is generated by semi-inner and mirror automorphisms

entry.title: Generalized inversion of Toeplitz-plus-Hankel matrices
entry.summary: A generalized inversion of block T+H matrix is obtained for the first time. In a particular case when T+H matrix is invertible, the method allows to obtain its inverse matrix without an additional condition of invertibility of the corresponding T-H matrix.

entry.title: On complete Lie algebras
entry.summary: In this paper, the author gives two methods to construct complete Lie algebras. Both methods show that the derivation algebras of some Lie algebras are complete.

entry.title: The Ends of Algebras
entry.summary: We introduce the notion of ends for algebras. The definition is analogous to the one in geometric group theory. We establish some relations to growth conditions and cyclic cohomology.

entry.title: Complete coverings and Galois corings
entry.summary: It is shown that any finite complete covering of a non-commutative algebra in the sense of Calow and Matthes (J. Geom. Phys. 32 (2000), 114--165) gives rise to a Galois coring.

entry.title: Simple subalgebras of simple special Jordan algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we determine all types and the canonical forms of simple subalgebras for each type of simple Jordan algebras and the number of conjugate classes corresponding to the given simple Jordan algebra.

entry.title: How to Expand the Zariski Topology
entry.summary: We introduce the notion of a Hu-Liu prime ideal in the context of left commutative rngs, and establish the contravariant functor from the category of left commutative rngs into the category of topological spaces.

entry.title: Modular group algebras with maximal Lie nilpotency indices
entry.summary: In the present paper we give the full description of the Lie nilpotent group algebras which have maximal Lie nilpotency indices.

entry.title: On existing of filtered multiplicative bases in group algebras
entry.summary: We give an explicit list of all p-groups G of order at most p^4 or 2^5 such that the group algebra KG over the field K of characteristic p has a filtered multiplicative K-basis.

entry.title: Tangent-like Spaces to Local Monoids
entry.summary: The main new notions are the notions of tangent-like spaces and local monoids. The main result is the pasage from a local monoid to its tangent-like space which is a local Leibniz algebra.

entry.title: Transformation Semigroups with the Deformed Multiplication
entry.summary: Pairwise non-isomorphic semigroups obtained from the finite inverse symmetric semigroup $\mathcal{IS}_n ,$ finite symmetric semigroup $\mathcal{T}_n$ and bicyclic semigroup by the deformed multiplication proposed by Ljapin are classified.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Bulletin of the University of Kiev, Series: Physics & Mathematics, 3 (2003), 82-88 (Ukrainian)

entry.title: Isolated and nilpotent subsemigroups in the variants of $\IS$
entry.summary: All isolated, completely isolated, and nilpotent subsemigroups in the semigroup $\IS$ of all injective partial transformations of an $n$-element set, considered as a semigroup with a sandwich multiplication are described.

entry.title: Green's relations on the deformed transformation semigroups
entry.summary: Green's relations on the deformed finite inverse symmetric semigroup $\mathcal{IS}_n$ and the deformed finite symmetric semigroup $\mathcal{T}_n$ are described.

entry.title: The Kac Jordan superalgebra: automorphisms and maximal subalgebras
entry.summary: The group of automorphisms of the Kac Jordan superalgebra is described, and used to classify the maximal subalgebras.

entry.title: Comatrix Corings and Galois Comodules over Firm Rings
entry.summary: We give a notion of a comatrix coring which embodies all former constructions and, what is more interesting, leads to the formulation of a notion of Galois coring and the statement of a Faithfully Flat Descent Theorem that generalize the previous versions.

entry.title: Automatic Rees matrix semigroups over categories
entry.summary: We consider the preservation of the properties of automaticity and prefix-automaticity in Rees matrix semigroups over semigroupoids and small categories. Some of our results are new or improve upon existing results in the single-object case of Rees matrix semigroups over semigroups.

entry.title: Purely infinite simple Leavitt path algebras
entry.summary: We give necessary and sufficient conditions on a row-finite graph E so that the Leavitt path algebra L(E) is purely infinite simple. This result provides the algebraic analog to the corresponding result for the Cuntz-Krieger C$^*$-algebra C$^*$(E) given in [7].

entry.title: Three deformation functors for associative algebras
entry.summary: We show that three deformation functors (deformations of the product, flat deformations and deformations of the relations) assigned to an associative algebra are naturally isomorphic.
entry.arxiv:comment: Corollary 4.4 still holds for projective limits

entry.title: Elementary n-Lie algebras
entry.summary: In this paper, we mainly study some properties of elementary n-Lie algebras, and prove some necessary and sufficient conditions for elementary n-Lie algebras, we also give the relations between elementary n-algebras and E-algebras.

entry.title: Inverse-closed additive subgroups of fields
entry.summary: We describe the additive subgroups of fields which are closed with respect to taking inverses. In particular, in characteristic different from two any such subgroup is either a subfield or the kernel of the trace map of a quadratic subextension of the field.

entry.title: The minimal clones above the permutations
entry.summary: We determine the atoms of the interval of the clone lattice consisting of those clones which contain all permutations, on an infinite base set. This is equivalent to the description of the atoms of the lattice of transformation monoids above the permutations.

entry.title: The structures of a class of $Z$-local rings
entry.summary: A local ring $R$ is called $Z$-local if $J(R) = Z(R)$ and $J(R)^2 = 0$. In this paper the structures of a class of $Z$-local rings are determined.

entry.title: Applications of the duality method to generalizations of the Jordan canonical form
entry.summary: The Jordan normal form for a matrix over an arbitrary field and the canonical form for a pair of matrices under contragredient equivalence are derived using Ptak's duality method.

entry.title: On convergence of infinite matrix products
entry.summary: A necessary and sufficient condition for the convergence of an infinite right product of matrices of the form | I B | A = | 0 C |, with (uniformly) contracting submatrices $C$, is proven.

entry.title: Recurrence matrices
entry.summary: We define recurrence matrices and study a few properties (links with automatic sequences, branch groups etc.) of them.
entry.arxiv:comment: 80 pages, examples and complements adjoined, some clarifications and small improvements

entry.title: Tensor Representations of the General Linear Supergroup
entry.summary: We show a correspondence between tensor representations of the super general linear group GL(m|n) and tensor representations of the general linear superalgebra gl(m|n) constructed by Berele and Regev.

entry.title: Non-Commutative Formal Groups In Positive Characterstic
entry.summary: We describe geometric non-commutative formal groups in terms of a geometric commutative formal group with a Poisson structure on its splay algebra. We describe certain natural properties of such Poisson structures and show that any such Poisson structure gives rise to a non-commutative formal group.

entry.title: Right ideals in non-associative universal enveloping algebras of Lie triple systems
entry.summary: We prove that the only proper right ideal of the universal enveloping algebra of a finite-dimensional central simple Lie triple system over a field of characteristic zero is its augmentation ideal.

entry.title: (Co)homology of triassociative algebras
entry.summary: We study homology and cohomology of triassociative algebras with non-trivial coefficients.
entry.arxiv:comment: 22 pages. To appear in Int. J. Math. Math. Sci
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: International Journal of Mathematics and Mathematical Sciences 2006 (2006), Article ID 69248, 21 pages.

entry.title: Number-Like Objects and the Extended Lie Correspondence
entry.summary: We classify finite dimensional division real associative $\mathcal{Z}_2$-algebras, introduce composition $\mathcal{Z}_2$-algebras, and extend the Campbell-Baker-Hausdorff series and Lie correspondence in the context of linear Hu-Liu Leibniz algebras.

entry.title: Algebraic lattices are complete sublattices of the clone lattice over an infinite set
entry.summary: The clone lattice Cl(X) over an infinite set X is a complete algebraic lattice with 2^X compact elements. We show that every algebraic lattice with at most 2^X compact elements is a complete sublattice of Cl(X).

entry.title: Hilbert series of modules of GK-dimension two over elliptic algebras
entry.summary: We characterize the Hilbert functions and minimal resolutions of (critical) Cohen-Macaulay graded right modules of Gelfand-Kirillov dimension two over generic quadratic and cubic three dimensional Artin-Schelter regular algebras.

entry.title: An Algorithm Computing the Local $b$ Function by an Approximate Division Algorithm in $\hat{\mathcal{D}}$
entry.summary: We give an algorithm to compute the local $b$ function. In this algorithm, we use the Mora division algorithm in the ring of differential operators and an approximate division algorithm in the ring of differential operators with power series coefficient.

entry.title: Relatively free algebras with the identity x^3=0
entry.summary: A base of a relatively free associative algebra with the identity x^3=0 over a field of arbitrary characteristic is found. As an application a minimal generating system of the 3x3 matrix invariant algebra is determined.

entry.title: The Anick automorphism of free associative algebras
entry.summary: We prove that the well-known Anick automorphism of the free associative algebra F<x,y,z> over an arbitrary field F of characteristic 0 is wild.

entry.title: Defining relations for automorphism groups of free algebras
entry.summary: We describe a set of defining relations for automorphism groups of finitely generated free algebras of Nielsen-Schreier varieties. In particular, this gives a representation of the automorphism groups of free Lie algebras by generators and defining relations.

entry.title: Cohomology and deformation of module-algebras
entry.summary: An algebraic deformation theory of module-algebras over a bialgebra is constructed. The cases of module-coalgebras, comodule-algebras, and comodule-coalgebras are also considered.
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear in J. Pure Applied Algebra. 14 pages
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Journal of Pure and Applied Algebra 209 (2007), 781-792.

entry.title: Symmetric Units and Group Identities in Group Algebras. I
entry.summary: We describe those group algebras over fields of characteristic different from 2 whose units symmetric with respect to the classical involution, satisfy some group identity.
entry.arxiv:comment: Dedicated to Professor L.G.Kovacs on his 70th birthday

entry.title: The Factorization of Braided Hopf Algebras
entry.summary: We obtain the double factorization of braided bialgebras or braided Hopf algebras, give relation among integrals and semisimplicity of braided Hopf algebra and its factors.

entry.title: Some remarks on localization in coalgebras
entry.summary: We analyze the geometry of the Ext-quiver of a coalgebra $C$ in order to study the behavior of simple and injective $C$-comodules under the action of the functors associated to a localizing subcategory of the category of $C$-comodules.

entry.title: Stable rank of Leavitt path algebras
entry.summary: We characterize the values of the stable rank for Leavitt path algebras, by giving concrete criteria in terms of properties of the underlying graph.
entry.arxiv:comment: Revised version, with added examples. To appear in Proc. Amer. Math. Soc

entry.title: Involutions on graded matrix algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we describe graded automorphisms and antiautomorphisms of finite order on matrix algebras endowed with a group gradings by a finite abelian group over an arbitrary algebraically closed field of charcteristic different from 2.

entry.title: Zassenhaus conjecture for central extensions of $S_{5}$
entry.summary: We confirm a conjecture of Zassenhaus about rational conjugacy of torsion units in integral group rings for a covering group of the symmetric group $S_{5}$ and for the general linear group $\text{GL}(2,5)$.

entry.title: Group gradings on superalgebras
entry.summary: In this paper we look into the structure of finite-dimensional graded superalgebras of various types such as associative, Lie and Jordan over an algebraically closed field of characteristic zero.

entry.title: A formulation of difference Galois theory
entry.summary: As a simple corollary of a highly general framework for differential and difference Galois theory introduced by Y. Andre, we formulate a version of the Galois correspondence that applies over a difference field with arbitrary field of constants.

entry.title: Hypercentral unit groups and the hyperbolicity of a modular group algebra
entry.summary: We classify groups G such that the unit group U(ZG) is hypercentral. In the second part we classify groups G whose modular group algebra has hyperbolic unit group V(KG).

entry.title: Quasi $Q_n$-filiform Lie algebras
entry.summary: In this paper we explicitly determine the derivation algebra, automorphism group of quasi $Q_n$-filiform Lie algebras, and applying some properties of root vector decomposition we obtain their isomorphism theorem.

entry.title: Even (Odd) Roots and Simple Leibniz Algebras with Lie Factor $s\ell_2$
entry.summary: We introduce 3-irreducible modules, even roots and odd roots for Leibniz algebras, produce a basis for a root space of a Leibniz algebra with a semisimple Lie factor, and classify finite dimensional simple Leibniz algebras with Lie factor $s\ell_2$.

entry.title: On the field of rational pseudo-differential operators
entry.summary: In this paper we study some properties of the field of rational pseudo-differential operators on a field and some other related rings. As an application we reconstruct the Kac co-cycle on the Lie algebra of differential operators on a circle.

entry.title: Hereditary is Hereditary
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the authors, due an error in Theorem 3.1 : the induced module is not in general a submodule.

entry.title: Compatibility Condition between ring and coring
entry.summary: We introduce the notion of bi-monoid in general monoidal category generalizing by this the notion of bialgebra. In the case of bimodules over a noncommutative algebra, we obtain a compatibility condition between ring and coring whenever both structures admit the same underlying bimodule.

entry.title: Generalizations of the primitive and normal basis theorems
entry.summary: Using a Zariski topology associated to a finite field extensions, we give new proofs and generalize the primitive and normal basis theorems.

entry.title: Primary Decompositions for Left Noetherian Rings
entry.summary: Two constructions are given that describe respectively all shortest primary decompositions and all shortest uniform decompositions for left Noetherian rings. They show that these decompositions are, in general, highly non-unique.

entry.title: Group convolutional codes
entry.summary: In this note we introduce the concept of group convolutional code. We make a complete classification of the minimal $S_3$-convolutional codes over the field of five elements by means of Jategaonkar's theorems.

entry.title: Deformations of the restricted Melikian Lie algebra
entry.summary: We compute the infinitesimal deformations of the restricted Melikian Lie algebra in characteristic 5.
entry.arxiv:comment: 18 page, expanded version, to appear on Comm. Alg

entry.title: Sur les algèbres de Lie quasi-filiformes admettant un tore de dérivations [On quasi-filiform Lie algebras admitting a torus of derivations]
entry.summary: The quasi-filiform Lie algebras of nonzero rank are described. The classifications of filiform and quasi-filiform naturally graded algebras are corrected.

entry.title: Injective representations of infinite quivers. Applications
entry.summary: In this article we study injective representations of infinite quivers. We classify the indecomposable injective representations of trees and then describe Gorenstein injective and projective representations of barren trees.

entry.title: On flexible quadratic algebras
entry.summary: Let R be a ring. A construction method for flexible quadratic algebras with scalar involution over R is presented which unifies various classical constructions in the literature, in particular those to construct composition algebras.

entry.title: A condition for cyclic algebras to be split
entry.summary: A simple sufficient condition for certain cyclic algebras of odd degree d to be split is presented. It employs certain binary forms of degree d and the values they represent. A similar sufficient condition for certain Albert algebras not to be division algebras is found as well.

entry.title: Group Gradings on $G_2$
entry.summary: In this paper we describe all group gradings by a finite abelian group $\Gamma$ of a simple Lie algebra of type $G_2$ over an algebraically closed field $F$ of characteristic 0.

entry.title: Smoothness of Algebraic Supervarieties and Supergroups
entry.summary: In this paper we discuss the notion of smoothness in complex algebraic supergeometry and we prove that all affine complex algebraic supergroups are smooth. We then prove the stabilizer theorem in the algebraic context, providing some useful applications.

entry.title: Adjoint and Frobenius Pairs of Functors, Equivalences, and the Picard Group for Corings
entry.summary: We study adjoint and Frobenius pairs of functors, equivalences, and the Picard group for corings.

entry.title: The Tits construction and some simple Lie superalgebras in characteristic 3
entry.summary: Some simple Lie superalgebras, specific of characteristic 3, defined by S. Bouarroudj and D. Leites, are shown to be related to the simple alternative and commutative superalgebras discovered by I.P. Shestakov.

entry.title: Integral group ring of the Mathieu simple group M24
entry.summary: We consider the Zassenhaus conjecture for the normalized unit group of the integral group ring of the Mathieu sporadic group $M_{24}$. As a consequence, for this group we confirm Kimmerle's conjecture on prime graphs.

entry.title: Integral group ring of the McLaughlin simple group
entry.summary: We consider the Zassenhaus conjecture for the normalized unit group of the integral group ring of the McLaughlin sporadic group McL. As a consequence, we confirm for this group the Kimmerle's conjecture on prime graphs.

entry.title: Baer and Mittag-Leffler modules over tame hereditary algebras
entry.summary: We develop a structure theory for two classes of infinite dimensional modules over tame hereditary algebras: the Baer modules, and the Mittag-Leffler ones.

entry.title: Jordan Triple Elementary Maps on Rings
entry.summary: We prove that Jordan triple elementary surjective maps on unital rings containing a nontrivial idempotent are automatically additive.

entry.title: Group gradings on simple Lie algebras of type A in positive characteristic
entry.summary: In this paper we consider gradings by a finite abelian group $G$ on the Lie algebra $\mathfrak{sl}_n(F)$ over an algebraically closed field $F$ of characteristic different from 2 and not dividing $n$.

entry.title: All creatures great and small
entry.summary: Let kappa be an uncountable regular cardinal. Assuming 2^kappa=kappa^+, we show that the clone lattice on a set of size kappa is not dually atomic.

entry.title: Jordan structures and non-associative geometry
